title: eurocopter font
content:
Hi!

can you help me to identify the eurocopter font.

Here is a link to the logo: [http://www.niczoushadz.com/wp-content/uploads/2009/01/logo-ecm.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20120614224403/http:/www.niczoushadz.com/wp-content/uploads/2009/01/logo-ecm.gif)

doudi
author: doudi
